item.title: Release of Crackhead Adventures v1.2.0
item.description: The version 1.2.0 of Crackhead Adventures has arrived! It will probably be the last version, unless a major bug is found or the game finds a small following, since we want to move on to other projects. This is just the beginning of our gamedev journey, and a successful one at that! We’d like to thank to everyone who played the game and supported us through the development. We love you <3

item.title: Release of Crackhead Adventures v1.1.0
item.description: First Update for Crackhead Adventures is here! Bringing new features and bugfixes. Things we added: Stats screen after completing the game that tracks: enemies killed damage taken shots fired cocaine snorted cocaine collected fun dust snorted fun dust crafted Settings menu that lets you change volume of music and sfx Version label in the main menu Things we fixed: A bug where the player couldn’t get hit when near an enemy A bug where the player could shoot through walls

item.title: Release of Crackhead Adventures v1.0.0
item.description: Today we released Crackhead Adventures version 1.0.0! We had great fun developing the game so far. We plan on improving on the current state of the project and listening to the feedback of our community. So, what changed? We added a timer for players to compare their speed We fixed a major bug that allowed the player to walk into walls Our plans for now Adding a setting menu with volume sliders Adding additional stats at the end of the playthrough Changing the effect of the fun dust Fixing bugs Begin working on the new game!

item.title: Started working on the website
item.description: We are now working on the official BigNtertainment website. It should be up and running by the half of September. After that we’re going to add our own theme to make the website stand out more.

item.title: Crackhead Adventures
item.description: Crackhead Adventures CONTENT WARNING! The game contains mature content, such as narcotics. TRIGGER WARNING! The game contains flashing images that might trigger epileptic seizures. Controls: WASD - movement Mouse - aiming and shooting E - snort cocaine (be faster, heal a bit) R - take the f u n d u s t (be a hella faster, but leaves you with almost no health) T - craft f u n d u s t from 3 bags of cocaine You are a drug-hungry crackhead fighting against the mafia to obtain the ultimate drug - the f u n n i e s t d u s t.
